definition.code:
team add malice_or_mercy.thecorruption "The Corruption"
team modify malice_or_mercy.thecorruption friendlyFire false
team join malice_or_mercy.thecorruption @e[type=malice_or_mercy:corrupt_fiend]
team join malice_or_mercy.thecorruption @e[type=malice_or_mercy:corrupt_hound]
team join malice_or_mercy.thecorruption @e[type=malice_or_mercy:corrupt_spider]
team join malice_or_mercy.thecorruption @e[type=malice_or_mercy:corrupt_beast]

schedule function malice_or_mercy:the_corruption_team_set 1t
definition.name: the_corruption_team_set
